member.summary: The URI for this resource, relative to https://api.twilio.com

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.Sid
member.summary: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.DateCreated
member.summary: The date that this resource was created

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.DateUpdated
member.summary: The date that this resource was last updated

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.DateSent
member.summary: The date that the SMS was sent

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.AccountSid
member.summary: The unique id of the Account that sent this SMS message.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.From
member.summary: The phone number that initiated the message in E.164 format. For incoming messages, this will be the remote phone. For outgoing messages, this will be one of your Twilio phone numbers.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.To
member.summary: The phone number that received the message in E.164 format. For incoming messages, this will be one of your Twilio phone numbers. For outgoing messages, this will be the remote phone.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.Body
member.summary: The text body of the SMS message. Up to 160 characters long.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.Status
member.summary: The status of this SMS message. Either queued, sending, sent, or failed.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.Direction
member.summary: The direction of this SMS message. incoming for incoming messages, outbound-api for messages initiated via the REST API, outbound-call for messages initiated during a call or outbound-reply for messages initiated in response to an incoming SMS.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.Price
member.summary: The amount billed for the message.

member.name: P:Twilio.SMSMessage.ApiVersion
member.summary: The version of the Twilio API used to process the SMS message.

member.name: T:Twilio.CallOptions
member.summary: Available options to include when initiating a phone call

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.From
member.summary: The phone number to use as the caller id. Format with a '+' and country code e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format). Must be a Twilio number or a valid outgoing caller id for your account.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.To
member.summary: The number to call formatted with a '+' and country code e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format). Twilio will also accept unformatted US numbers e.g., (415) 555-1212, 415-555-1212.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.Url
member.summary: The fully qualified URL that should be consulted when the call connects. Just like when you set a URL for your inbound calls.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.ApplicationSid
member.summary: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle this phone call. If this parameter is present, Twilio will ignore all of the voice URLs passed and use the URLs set on the application.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.StatusCallback
member.summary: A URL that Twilio will request when the call ends to notify your app.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.StatusCallbackMethod
member.summary: The HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.Method
member.summary: The HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the required Url parameter's value above. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.SendDigits
member.summary: A string of keys to dial after connecting to the number. Valid digits in the string include: any digit (0-9), '#' and '*'. For example, if you connected to a company phone number, and wanted to dial extension 1234 and then the pound key, use SendDigits=1234#. Remember to URL-encode this string, since the '#' character has special meaning in a URL.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.IfMachine
member.summary: Tell Twilio to try and determine if a machine (like voicemail) or a human has answered the call. Possible values are Continue and Hangup.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.Timeout
member.summary: The integer number of seconds that Twilio should allow the phone to ring before assuming there is no answer. Default is 60 seconds, the maximum is 999 seconds. Note, you could set this to a low value, such as 15, to hangup before reaching an answering machine or voicemail.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.FallbackUrl
member.summary: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.FallbackMethod
member.summary: The HTTP method that Twilio should use to request the FallbackUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.Record
member.summary: Set this parameter to 'true' to record the entirety of a phone call. The RecordingUrl will be sent to the StatusCallback URL. Defaults to 'false'.

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.SipAuthUsername
member.summary: If this is a Sip call, set the authorization username for your Sip endpoint

member.name: P:Twilio.CallOptions.SipAuthPassword
member.summary: If this is a Sip call, set the authorization password for your Sip endpoint

member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioRestClient.ChangeSubAccountStatus(System.String,Twilio.AccountStatus)
member.summary: Changes the status of a subaccount. You must be authenticated as the master account to call this method on a subaccount. WARNING: When closing an account, Twilio will release all phone numbers assigned to it and shut it down completely. You can't ever use a closed account to make and receive phone calls or send and receive SMS messages. It's closed, gone, kaput. It will still appear in your accounts list, and you will still have access to historical data for that subaccount, but you cannot reopen a closed account.

The status to change the subaccount to

member.summary: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.

member.name: P:Twilio.ApplicationOptions.SmsFallbackMethod
member.summary: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsFallbackUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.ApplicationOptions.VoiceCallerIdLookup
member.summary: Do a lookup of a caller's name from the CNAM database and post it to your app. Either true or false. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Twilio.ApplicationOptions.SmsStatusCallback
member.summary: Twilio will make a POST request to this URL to pass status parameters (such as sent or failed) to your application if you specify this application's Sid as the ApplicationSid on an outgoing SMS request.

member.name: P:Twilio.ApplicationOptions.StatusCallbackMethod
member.summary: The HTTP method Twilio will use to make requests to the StatusCallback URL. Either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: T:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest
member.summary: Search filter options for AvailablePhoneNumber search

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.AreaCode
member.summary: Find phone numbers in the specified Area Code. Only available for North American numbers.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.Contains
member.summary: A pattern to match phone numbers on. Valid characters are '*' and [0-9a-zA-Z]. The '*' character will match any single digit.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.InRegion
member.summary: Limit results to a particular region (i.e. State/Province). Given a phone number, search within the same Region as that number.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.InPostalCode
member.summary: Limit results to a particular postal code. Given a phone number, search within the same postal code as that number.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.NearLatLong
member.summary: Given a latitude/longitude pair lat,long find geographically close numbers within Distance miles.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.Distance
member.summary: Specifies the search radius for a Near- query in miles. If not specified this defaults to 25 miles.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.NearNumber
member.summary: Given a phone number, find a geographically close number within Distance miles. Distance defaults to 25 miles.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.InLata
member.summary: Limit results to a specific Local access and transport area (LATA). Given a phone number, search within the same LATA as that number.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.InRateCenter
member.summary: Limit results to a specific rate center, or given a phone number search within the same rate center as that number. Requires InLata to be set as well.

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.SmsEnabled
member.summary: Set to 'true' or 'false'. If true, the response will contain SMS enabled phone numbers. The voice capability is independent of the SMS capability

member.name: P:Twilio.AvailablePhoneNumberListRequest.VoiceEnabled
member.summary: Set to 'true' or 'false'. If true, the response will contain Voice enabled phone numbers. The SMS capability is independent of the Voice capability.

member.summary: The phone number that received this call. e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format)

member.summary: The phone number that made this call. e.g., +16175551212 (E.164 format)

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.PhoneNumberSid
member.summary: If the call was inbound, this is the Sid of the IncomingPhoneNumber that received the call. If the call was outbound, it is the Sid of the OutgoingCallerId from which the call was placed.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.Status
member.summary: A string representing the status of the call. May be queued, ringing, in-progress, completed, failed, busy or no-answer.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.StartTime
member.summary: The start time of the call, given as GMT in RFC 2822 format. Empty if the call has not yet been dialed.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.EndTime
member.summary: The end time of the call, given as GMT in RFC 2822 format. Empty if the call did not complete successfully.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.Duration
member.summary: The length of the call in seconds. This value is empty for busy, failed, unanswered or ongoing calls.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.Price
member.summary: The charge for this call in USD. Populated after the call is completed. May not be immediately available.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.Direction
member.summary: A string describing the direction of the call. inbound for inbound calls, outbound-api for calls initiated via the REST API or outbound-dial for calls initiated by a Dial verb.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.AnsweredBy
member.summary: If this call was initiated with answering machine detection, either human or machine. Empty otherwise.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.ForwardedFrom
member.summary: If this call was an incoming call forwarded from another number, the forwarding phone number (depends on carrier supporting forwarding). Empty otherwise.

member.name: P:Twilio.Call.CallerName
member.summary: If this call was an incoming call from a phone number with Caller ID Lookup enabled, the caller's name. Empty otherwise.

member.name: T:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions
member.summary: Available options when purchasing phone numbers via the API. NOTE: you can only request phone numbers with a full Twilio account, not in the Twilio Free Trial. If you would like to buy a Twilio phone number, you must upgrade your account.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.AccountSid
member.summary: The AccountSid to assign this number to. Only used for moving phone numbers betweeen subaccounts.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.AreaCode
member.summary: The area code in which you'd like a new incoming phone number. Any three digit, US area code is valid. Twilio will provision a random phone number within this area code for you. You must include either this or a PhoneNumber parameter to have your POST succeed.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.PhoneNumber
member.summary: The phone number you want to purchase. The number should be formated starting with a '+' followed by the country code and the number in E.164 format e.g., '+15105555555'. You must include either this or an AreaCode parameter to have your POST succeed.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.FriendlyName
member.summary: A human readable description of the new incoming phone number. Maximum 64 characters. Defaults to a formatted version of the number.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.SmsApplicationSid
member.summary: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle SMSs sent to this number. If a SmsApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the SMS urls above and use those set on the application.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.VoiceApplicationSid
member.summary: The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle phone calls to this number. If a VoiceApplicationSid is present, Twilio will ignore all of the voice urls above and use those set on the application.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.VoiceUrl
member.summary: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials the new phone number.

member.summary: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.VoiceFallbackUrl
member.summary: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML at Url.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.VoiceFallbackMethod
member.summary: The HTTP method that should be used to request the VoiceFallbackUrl. Either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.SmsUrl
member.summary: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the phone number.

member.summary: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.SmsFallbackUrl
member.summary: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.SmsFallbackMethod
member.summary: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsFallbackUrl. Must be either GET or POST. Defaults to POST.

member.name: P:Twilio.PhoneNumberOptions.VoiceCallerIdLookup
